item.description:
Since there was so much interest in this Saturday's AM meetup, I've decided to add an afternoon session. . .which will also make the late risers happy.

Get your tennis in before the rain arrives on Sunday.


This Meetup is informal and unstructured - show up and play with whoever else shows up. Open to all levels.

Â 

Will someone please volunteer to be the host as I will attending the morning session? All that is required is to show up!. . .(And maybe say "yes" if someone asks are you with Meetup or invite someone to join in if they look lost.)

Thanks.
item.name: Late Risers Special: Saturday Afternoon Tennis
